EmailTemplate.name: Meeting is disapproved by the leader
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting rejection:{!Custom_Event__c.Start_Time__c} - {!Custom_Event__c.End_Time__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Custom_Event__c.Contact__c}, This email is to inform you that the meeting with {!Custom_Event__c.Attached_to__c} scheduled for {!Custom_Event__c.Start_Time__c} - {!Custom_Event__c.End_Time__c} with the subject: {!Custom_Event__c.Subject__c} has been declined.
